description:
encoding/binary: optimize for common types in slices

This patch also adds a matching benchmark to test the
improvement.

Before:
BenchmarkWriteSlice1000Int32s	   10000	    122838 ns/op	  32.56 MB/s

After:
BenchmarkWriteSlice1000Int32s	  100000	     24105 ns/op	 165.93 MB/s

Fixes issue 2634.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: bradfitz@golang.org, golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

I'd like to think about this for a while more.
This is a bandaid on a bandaid.

subject: code review 5532080: encoding/binary: optimize for common types in slices
